thread.title: Inside Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's Jamaican love nest: Pair spotted snuggling at luxury resort during pal's wedding
thread.title_full: Inside Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's Jamaican love nest: Pair spotted snuggling at luxury resort during pal's wedding

author: Steve Robson
title: Inside Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's Jamaican love nest: Pair spotted snuggling at luxury resort during pal's wedding
text:
Get celebs   
This is the Jamaican love nest where Prince Harry has shacked up with girlfriend Meghan Markle for his pal's luxury wedding. 
The pair jetted in to the Caribbean island, where temperatures are a perfect 30 degrees, separately earlier this week having not seen each other for a fortnight. 
They attended the wedding of Tom 'Skippy' Inskip, a friend from Harry's Eton days, and Lara Hughes-Young, on Friday at the Round Hill Hotel in Montego Bay. 
The plush resort has 27 private villas and Harry is believed to be cosying up in the priciest accommodation - a six-bed villa with its own pool where guests pay £14,000 for a three-night minimum stay. Prince Harry jetted into Jamaica on Wednesday for his friend's wedding (Photo: Collect Unknown) Meghan arrived the next day and will meet Harry's 'close circle' (Photo: Rex Features) Meghan Markle in Suits (Photo: Getty images) 
They are already said to have been enjoying the romantic setting. 
One observer told The Sun: "Harry was all over her — he couldn’t keep his hands off her. 
"She had on a long white shirt to keep the sun off, but soon stripped off to just a panama hat and bikini. 
"Harry wrapped her in his arms and kept kissing her. " The hotel Harry and Meghan are staying in for Jamaica jaunt (Photo: Roundhill Hotel) The Round Hill Hotel in Montego Bay has 27 private villas (Photo: Roundhill Hotel) Harry and Meghan are believed to be in one of the most expensive villas in the resort (Photo: Roundhill Hotel) Temperatures are a perfect 30 degrees in Jamaica this week (Photo: Roundhill Hotel) 
"Later on the beach he took her hand and led her into the sea for a dip. 
" At one point she sat on his knee in the water and they were cuddling. It was very cute. 
"They are both head over heels and don’t care who sees it." 
It is believed Tom and Lara's celebrations will be a three-day event, with Jamaican superstar Usain Bolt rumoured to be making a guest appearance. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
